summary: Humanity makes its last stand as zombies emerge to take over the world in this cinematic tale of gore and chaos.
cast: Tom Eplin|Sabrina Gennarino|Travis Brorsen|Roshelle Baier|John Lee Ames|Bryan Rasmussen|Eric Stuart|Chris Ivan Cevic|Marian Tomas Griffin|Ashley Elizabeth Pierce|William Cannon|Pieter Gaspersz|Jason Jensen
title: Days of Darkness
